u.a: ABE at car , turns wheel . CHI begins account , while exploring room . this is val's account of webb's experiment , which she relates at direction of experimenter . CHI picks up tape measure , ABE glances as she talks .
CHI stands still and speaks . CHI moves off , picks up iron , turns to ABE . CHI distracted , looks about room , goes to stove , opens door of oven
val's speech fades out , moves from stove to floor , gasps as she finds blocks .
ABE leaves car , joins her as she begins to play with firetruck
CHI diverted , moves about , picks up pipe and carries it , mumbles ABE absorbed in fire truck CHI moves to box , mumbles
CHI sees dress up clothes , this is louder . ABE looks up at CHI and fire hat CHI goes through play clothes
ABE sings to self and then addresses CHI . CHI looks up at this .
CHI moves to box very matter of fact . CHI picks up receiver of telephone and dials while answering .
exaggerated

CHI plays , smiles at ABE second repeat faster ABE moves past her , smiling and repeats this as question in appreciation ABE rolls fire truck on wooden car , goes to pick up ladder , talks to himself , singing
CHI moves toward sofa , points ABE looks up at snake as CHI speaks with pretended fright , really more surprise .
ABE looks at CHI speaks slowly and directly play condescension .
CHI laughs .
ABE using baby talk "kwaym"
ABE using baby talk "kwaym"
CHI picks up lunch box
ABE using baby talk
CHI moves behind car and then CHI finds tools
ABE puts ladders together

CHI looks up at his exclamation and glances , but is more absorbed in her discovery , CHI brings toy tool to car . ABE glances at tools CHI glances at ladder as ABE speaks expressively CHI looks at toys and speaks rapidly , ABE glances at toys .
ABE returns to car and ladder . addressed to the ladder
CHI interested in car , touches it .
ABE plays with fire truck
CHI gestures to car
CHI leans on car and watches abe's fire truck cab of fire truck falls off .
ABE fixes it .
CHI gets up CHI bored , obscured talk .
ABE replies abstractedly and a little fuzzy . CHI goes to wall , cab falls off again
ABE still at car .
CHI tries on hat , takes it off
ABE sings "bum bum" while fingers walk up ladder , CHI looks
CHI passes car , token play with ABE , then wanders off
CHI soft
ABE looks around at this .
CHI speaks with play voice , CHI giggles ABE watches a few seconds and returns to fire ladder play . no direct gaze
ABE looks up for a moment at this .
CHI has pipe , picks up tape measure fails to interest ABE in tool belt and tape measure
ABE drops part of car , truck falls off car , CHI and ABE exchange glances
CHI sees car vacant and touches it , asking permission
"okay" is slow
CHI gets on , then off , gets on climbs on back
ABE drive seeriously while CHI talks . CHI puts arms around ABE to keep from falling off .
voices are calm and there is little physical activity , soft driving noise made by
CHI offers suggestion , attractively , as an alternative to monsters .
ABE accepts with some enthusiasm
CHI gets off car as part of game , ABE follows her .
CHI speaks in high enthusiastic voice , CHI presents lunch box to ABE who seems to accept it as part of game , ABE takes tools to car CHI goes to stove , opens oven
ABE does look as asked .
CHI holds up shoes to show ABE CHI puts shoes in oven turns knobs . takes them out and shows abe
ABE finds necklaces in tool box and immediately brings it to val
she puts it around her neck and she reacts "Oh"
CHI takes off necklace to propose more complicated game , which ABE accepts .
ABE takes necklace back , goes to car while CHI turns back to stove
CHI works at stove .
ABE carries out plan , puts necklace back in lunch box , gets on car and makes driving noises on way home
CHI sees broom and starts sweeping as part of play act ABE parks car and comes in with lunch box
at this , CHI stands smiling with eyes closed . ABE goes to couch with lunch box and prepares to open it , CHI still grins delightedly
CHI adds sweeping with eyes closed to act like housewife
CHI sweeps ABE gently .
ABE hands her necklace , she reaches out for it with "oh" of delight and speaks in very high "feminine" voice .
ABE takes up his lunch box .
xxx is singing
CHI points to snake .
CHI laughs as reply to this . ABE hums as he takes lunch box to car
CHI removes necklace , kneels at stove , but laughs at "stew" ABE hums .
CHI turns from the stove to face ABE on the car as she addresses him
CHI accepts his change of topic aggreeably but then proceeds to direct the conversation again toward cooking
CHI throws her head back in a very "feminine" way
as CHI stands up , she appears to discover bag of clothes and seizes on ties as a good attention getter for her working husband
when ABE doesn't seem to show any interest , she raises her voice , and addresses directly
the falling broom occupies val's attention , and her response to this is uncertain .
CHI returns to stove and starts fooling with the knobs , she quickly tires of them CHI says this clearly and with an eye to ABE , for it serves as her excuse to get on the car .
to baby
ABE is shocked at val's takeover of car . CHI laughs when ABE realizes that she has car .
now she keeps it with play act ruse but her choice of the baby role is her downfall .
ABE addresses her as baby and begins pulling her off the car . CHI holds tight and seems to enjoy the whole thing .
CHI again turns her ruse to her advantage by insisting that ABE , as the father , lift her off the car .
ABE doesn't seem to relish the father role , and as soon as he has gotten CHI off the car , he gets on
resignedly , ABE allows CHI on back .
CHI gets on , wiggling and squirming . she wraps her arms around abe
to baby
said straight intonation . this meets with no response from val
CHI gets off the car , picks up something from the floor and walks toward the sofa . ABE watches .
ABE obeys this and closes his eyes . CHI runs up , dumps the stuff in the steering wheel .
ABE is happy with it and smiles with this .
ABE quickly decides to use the tools on the "broken" car .

CHI laughs at "broken" . CHI quickly perceives the high interest of the car and gears her next gift toward it by saying she has a necklace for the car . she drapes the necklace over the steering wheel .

ABE is in the back of the car fooling with the license plate . CHI takes the lunch box she had placed on the car and takes it over to the stove . ABE abruptly gets up , goes over to the light switch and turns it off and then on .
because the spotlights don't go out , is appropriate . ABE returns to the tools and the car , looks at CHI cooking .
CHI returns rapidly to the topic of cooking ABE is preoccupied with the tools
CHI abruptly stops all food talk and comes over to the car with the tape measure and begins "measuring" the car .
ABE shows little interest until now . he takes hold of the measure and places it on the car .

CHI takes it back , places it on her body , twists around and sings "poop poop" . ABE and CHI laugh at her silliness . CHI returns to her measuring briefly , turns from the car , poop talks , again twisting her body . CHI laughs at herself , with ABE , and then drops the tape measure .
ABE refers to the measure which he now picks up
CHI reaches for another tool and works on the far side of the car .
ABE uses the tape . CHI takes the flashlight over to the oven and places it in there .
ABE picks up the tool belt and the tape measure and heads over toward the oven . he sits down beside it .
in a burst of energy , ABE reaches in the oven for his flashlight , while CHI watches delightedly
CHI bends over and takes a mock bit out of the flashlight
CHI again bends over for a "bite"
CHI picks up the lunchbox .

at her mention of the word "flashlight" , ABE reaches over , grabs it and hides it behind his back . CHI laughs in response . CHI then takes the tool belt and puts it in the oven ABE reaches into the oven and takes it . there is much excited activity in the vicinity of the oven door . the grabbing is part of the fun , not done with serious intent .
CHI pretends to be eating something .
CHI takes the pliers from the floor , stands up and throws it across the room
ABE turns to the oven

CHI pats his back in a comradely way and kneels back down . they are both sitting down in front of the oven concerned with stuffing things in the oven , although CHI seems content to watch ABE do most of the work . they both fool with the control knobs .
CHI hits ABE on the rear and back , more forcefully than before , and then grabs him .
ABE picks something up and places it on the stove .
as CHI agrees to heat it up and stuffs the object in the oven , ABE gets up and walks away .
at this CHI looks up .
in this CHI enunciates "trashcan" very clearly CHI twists around to watch his search and laughs at his efforts to search in the trashcan because she knows it's not there .
spoken rather triumphantly .
CHI turns to see , then turns to stove and starts pulling things from the oven . ABE comes over and watches .
ABE kneels down to pick the things up .
CHI again pretends to be eating . CHI stands up to watch ABE as he collects the objects from the floor .
CHI pats ABE on the back
CHI kneels down at the stove and opens the oven door so that ABE can stuff the objects inside
they are both sitting in front of the stove , looking at it , fooling with the knobs
abe's attention turns to the bag of clothes . he pulls out a tie . CHI stands up to watch him . she laughts in response to this .
CHI notices a tool sitting on the car . she goes to get it and returns to the stove .
ABE is busy with the clothes and does not pick up his head until CHI returns and speaks with increasing loudness .
ABE has pulled out a skirt from the bag and is concerned with covering the stove with it .
CHI runs back to the car and sits on it .
ABE pays no visual attention to val's that but does respond with this in an attempt to refute her claim that he's using the skirt improperly .
CHI laughs at ABE , this does not appear to be addressed to val
said in a high voice . she throws a necklace on the floor . ABE turns around to get it .
he picks it up , stands up and drapes the necklace on the steering wheel as CHI watches .
ABE grabs the steering wheel and both children turn it . there is a power struggle over possession of the car , but done more as a game than a fight .

ABE concedes by going to the back of the car and climbing on . CHI , as driver , sways with the wheel , sings , and takes on a hearty voice as conductor . ABE kneels , behind . he gets off to pick up the indian pipe and CHI tells him to "get on quick" .

ABE returns and CHI continues to occupy conductor role by making driving noises . she leans her body back into abe's and bumps him . CHI is preoccupied with the wheel , ABE is staring at the wall opposite the camera . ABE gives no verbal response to this but turns and seems to be putting the pipe in val's ear .
she backs away and responds this .
she backs away and responds this .
she backs away and responds this .

ABE suddenly gets off the car and goes to the door . CHI watches him and then twists her whole body so that she can see better . she turns around and gets back on the car , but for the most part her glance is concentrated on ABE at the door . ABE seems to be speaking to himself at the door , but he suddenly runs over to CHI and tells her something about what he's seen . she appears interested , but then turns her attention back to steering . ABE stands there , as if waiting for something . ABE examines the big box , turns back to the car .
both children are on floor .
ABE emerging from box . CHI gets back on the car , and ABE crawls back into the box . CHI watches him .
